text:
="preserve">Ashraf Hossain (– 18 July 2020) was a Bangladeshi politician. He was a member of the Bangladesh Nationalist Party. He was a member of the Jatiya Sangsad between 1991 to 1996 and again from 2006 to 2008. Hossain was born in Dhaka.
Hossain died on 18 July 2020 at a hospital in Dhaka from cancer, aged 79.
